data.title: CHAPTER 4 LAYING THE FOUNDATIONS FOR THE HUNGERPOLITIK
data.meta_description: CHAPTER 4 LAYING THE FOUNDATIONS FOR THE HUNGERPOLITIK was published in Exploitation, Resettlement, Mass Murder on page 47.
